variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Array_DNA_Methylation: Genome-wide DNA methylation profiling using methylation arrays, quantitative methylation measurements at the single-CpG-site level; Seq_ChIP: Chromatin immunoprecipitation sequencing; Seq_DNA_RRBS: Reduced representation bisulfite sequencing; Seq_RNA_WTSS: Whole transcriptome shotgun sequencing (RNA-seq)
